abstract: Industrial & Commercial Bank of China, the world’s biggest lender by market value, reported a surge in fourth-quarter profit, fueled by a lending boom and lower provisions against sour assets.
snippet: Industrial & Commercial Bank of China, the world’s biggest lender by market value, reported a surge in fourth-quarter profit, fueled by a lending boom and lower provisions against sour assets.
lead_paragraph: Industrial & Commercial Bank of China, the world’s biggest lender by market value, reported a surge in fourth-quarter profit, fueled by a lending boom and lower provisions against sour assets, Reuters reports.

headline.main: I.C.B.C. Profit Jumps on Lending Boom
